name: Silk Gate
uniques: [+1 Production] from [Camp] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Silk Gate provides slightly more Culture, and makes Camp improvements better.

name: Beehive
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Bonus resource] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Beehive are more expensive to build, but the Food bonus affects every Bonus resource, rather than only Deer, Bananas and Wheat.

name: Alchemy
uniques: [+1 Science] per [2] population [in this city]
[+2 Science] from [Plantation] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Alchemy provides more Science for each Plantations.

name: Tavern
uniques: New [Military] units start with [15] Experience [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured
[1] free [Swordsman] units appear

civilopediaText.text: Tavern is cheaper to build, and gives free Swordsman when built.

name: Furnace
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Spaceship part] units [in this city]
[+15]% Production when constructing [Land] units [in this city]
[+1 Production] from [Iron] tiles [in this city]
All newly-trained [{Land} {Melee}] units [in this city] receive the [Fresh Forged] promotion

civilopediaText.text: Furnace can be build in any city without requiring Iron, and grants Fresh Forged promotion for Land Melee units.

name: Storyteller's Hut
uniques: [+1 Science] per [2] population [in this city]
[+1 Happiness] per [10] population [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Storyteller's Hut provides Happiness, and some more with more population.

name: Overseer Tower
uniques: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Can only be built [in annexed cities]
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text:
Overseer Tower is cheaper to build, less maintenance cost, and generates Culture.
Additionally, it'll be destroyed when the city is captured.

name: Synthesized Garden
uniques: [+25]% Great Person generation [in this city]
[15]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city]
Doesn't require to be adjacent to Fresh Water to be built

civilopediaText.text: Synthesized Garden can be build in any city, and boosts Population generation.

name: Hunting School
uniques: New [Military] units start with [15] Experience [in this city]
New [{Land} {Ranged}] units start with [10] Experience [in this city]
[+1 Food] from [Camp] tiles [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: Hunting School gives Land Ranged more Experience, and makes Camp improvements better.
